About

I am currently a student in the Master of Science in Robotics program at University of Michigan Ann Arbor. I graduated from the Nanyang Technological University in 2017 with a Bachelor of Engineering’s degree in Mechanical Engineering.
From 2017 to 2019, I have worked as a research engineer in Biorobotics Lab under Prof Haoyong Yu at National University of Singapore. On summer 2020, I worked as a Robotics software intern at Refraction AI, developing localization module for the platform.
